CellLayout - Class in org.openremote.entities.panel.version1
Cell layout used inside a grid layout; cell can contain one widget and is positioned within the grid by column, row, columnspan and rowspan properties

CommandSender - Interface in org.openremote.entities.panel
Interface for components that can send commands to the controller
CommandWidget - Interface in org.openremote.entities.panel
Interface for widgets that need to send commands to the controller; at registration time the controller service will call setCommandSender the widget is responsible for calling commandSender.sendCommand when required.
connect(AsyncControllerCallback<ControllerConnectionStatus>, int) - Method in interface org.openremote.java.console.controller.connector.ControllerConnector
Connects to the controller and maintains the connection; it is the connectors responsibility to notify the caller via the callback onFailure method when the connection closes for some reason
connect(AsyncControllerCallback<ControllerConnectionStatus>, int) - Method in class org.openremote.java.console.controller.Controller
